attributes.action: Stop giving the Banks Money and Pay off every one Mortgages with OUR Money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am Petitioning the government to stop giving Private companies., ie the Banks Billions of Tax Payers Money.
Pay off everyones Mortgage, which will give the Banks the Money another way, that will Kick-start the economy from the bottom, give people money to spend and save jobs etc, etc... MAKES SENSE MR.BROWN,,,,ACT NOW

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
